column2: SOUTH CAROLINA DMV WRITTEN TEST
Question Text
1. When turning, drivers should:
column6: always move to the right lane.
column8: increase their speed to improve stability.

column2: 2. This road sign means:
3. Parking is not allowed:
column6: on the road side of a parked vehicle.

column2: 4. This sign warns drivers of:
5. A yellow arrow means:
column4: Do not go in the direction of the arrow.
column6: The same as a steady yellow light.
column8: If you intend to turn in the direction of the arrow, be prepared to stop.

column2: 6. On a four-lane highway, slower traffic should travel:
7. How can you prevent fatigue on a long trip?
column6: Plan to drive long trips with a companion.

column2: 8. This sign tells drivers that:
column6: they must make a left turn at the intersection.
column8: they must not make a right turn.

column2: 9. If the roadway is wet, you should:
column6: Turn on your four way flashers and continue.

column2: 10. When approaching a highway-rail intersection, the first sign drivers see is usually:
column8: an RXR round sign on a yellow background.

column2: 11. The yield sign means:
column4: If the way is clear, you may move forward slowly without stopping.
column8: Go. The light will soon be red.

column2: 12. A large vehicle is backing up to unload goods. You should:
column6: enter one of the blind spots and wait.
column8: be patient and wait until the large vehicle has completed its backup maneuver.

column2: 13. Pentagonal signs are used to indicate:
14. Destination signs are ______ with ____ letters and symbols.
15. Driver distractions include:
column4: Slowing down to look at crash scene.
column8: turning your headlights on when rain and fog make it hard to see.

column2: 16. At many intersections a right turn may be made while the traffic light is red. Before turning right drivers must:
column4: stop, look both ways and yield the right of way to pedestrians and other traffic.
column6: slow down and, if the way is clear, proceed without stopping.
column8: maintain constant speed because they have the right of way.

column2: 17. This road sign means:
column8: You have the right of way

column2: 18. If you are involved in an accident, you should:
column4: drive to the closest police station to report the accident.
column6: stop as close to the scene of the crash as possible and move your vehicle to the shoulder of the road.
column8: report the accident to the police within one week.

column2: 19. Which signs have black letters on a yellow or orange background?
20. If your front wheels start to skid, the first thing you should do is:
column4: Speed up, pump your brakes and steer in the direction the vehicle is trying to go.
column6: Take your foot off the gas pedal and shift to neutral.
column8: Immediately turn in the direction you want to go.

column2: 21. A flashing yellow light means:
column6: The light will soon change from green to red.
column8: Yield the right-of-way to other traffic at the intersection.

column2: 22. This sign tells drivers:
column4: they must wait for the traffic signal to turn green before turning right or left.
column6: they may not turn right or left during the red light.

column2: 23. ___________ are green with white letters and symbols.
24. This sign means:
column4: Drivers are coming to a point where another traffic lane joins the one they are on.

column2: 25. What is a likely effect when you take another drug while you drink alcohol?
column4: The effects of the alcohol and the drug are enhanced.
column6: If the drug is over-the-counter, there are no effects.
column8: There are no effects, unless the drug is prescription only.

column2: 26. A thumping sound can be a warning:
column8: that a tire blowout is about to occur.

column2: 27. When driving in fog, you should use your low beam headlights.
28. What do pennant-shaped signs indicate?
29. Diamond-shaped signs:
column6: are used to warn of hazards on roadways.

column2: 30. If you are stopped by a police officer, you should:
column4: Stop your vehicle as far away from traffic as possible.
column6: Pull over to the right side of the road.
